title: Title screen
content:
The title screen is the first interface that opens when the game is launched. It prominently features a title animation in its center.

The news button in the top left corner of the title screen can be used to open the in-game news interface. This interface is also automatically opened when the player launches the game for the first time after installing it; after the first time the title screen opens with the news interface closed.

The button to open the settings interface is found in the top right corner of the title screen.

Under the title animation there is the "play" button which can be used to continue to log into the player's account, leading to the choose a slot interface if successful.

On the bottom of the title screen there is a copyright note including links to the terms and conditions, privacy notice, and third party licenses.

Various music tracks play in the title screen.

The console can be opened any time the game is open, including the title screen, by pressing the keyboard key below the escape key.
